items.sentence: You look like a kid who was just caught with his hand in the cookie jar.

Is it true that there are more male bus drivers than female bus drivers?
The bus didn't have any passengers on board at the time of the accident.
If the bus driver had had a gun, things might've turned out differently.
If it hadn't been for your raincoat, I would've been soaked to the bone.
Buckle down and get to work. Do you think we're on a Sunday picnic here?
No matter how interesting magic shows may be, I don't like them so much.
What that fortuneteller said yesterday is nothing to be concerned about.
This is how I've always done this, and I plan to keep doing it this way.
If anyone finds out what I did, I'll be the laughingstock of the school.
The doors opened and a large crowd of people rushed out of the building.
The hospital that used to be across the street remained open until 2013.
My father always thought that he wanted to be a pilot when he was a boy.
My mother told me that a boy should never kiss a girl on the first date.
Tom knew that Mary had told John that she saw Alice kissing another man.
Many people think that children spend too much time watching television.
The world follows one golden rule: whoever has the gold makes the rules.
At the moment, it doesn't look like the conflict will end any time soon.
Frederic Chopin wrote his first composition when he was seven years old.
